title: Anyone experiencing significant battery drain (even on stand by) after the Aug 5th 2020 update.
content:
Anyone experiencing fast battery drain after the Aug 5th monthly update 2020? Even on stand by it drains about 10 to 15% for a period of 8 hours. Am I the only one facing this situation? All the background apps are closed and there was nothing running in the background too. 
Your kind replies are much appreciated.
Thank you.
